mapper.insert: INSERT INTO com_file( file_id, file_name, file_size, file_path, file_name_orig, file_dir, create_by, create_date) VALUES (trim(#{fileId}), trim(#{fileName}), trim(#{fileSize}), trim(#{fileUploadPath}), trim(#{OriginalFilename}), trim(#{fileUploadDir}), #{currentUser}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.select: SELECT file_id "fileId", file_name "fileName", file_size "fileSize", file_path "filePath", file_name_orig "fileNameOrig", file_dir "fileDir" FROM com_file WHERE file_id=#{fileId}
